name: rainy day (bee tea)
description:
♡ a short game about a family's struggle with and recovery from depression

♡ made in 3 days with bitsy for the "5-years-o-bitsy" game jam. if you like it, consider leaving a comment or rating to let me know! ^_^

♡ "Lazy Day" by David Renda

♡ link: fesliyanstudios

♡ donations of $1 or more get a complimentary downloadable art piece of the game!

♡ tbh most of the time i spent on this was just writing all the different dialogue variations. let me know if you have any problems with the game!
